verses.verse: It happened in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month, <S%H2568><s%> in the fifth day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> as I sat <S%H3427><s%> in my house, <S%H1004><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H3027><s%> that the hand of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> fell there on me. <S%H5307><s%>

Then I saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H1823><s%> a likeness as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire; <S%H784><s%> from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his waist <S%H4975><s%> and downward, <S%H4295><s%> fire; <S%H784><s%> and from his waist <S%H4975><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brightness, <S%H2096><s%> as it were glowing <S%H5869><s%> metal. <S%H2830><s%>

He put forth <S%H7971><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> me by a lock <S%H6734><s%> of my head; <S%H7218><s%> and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%> between earth <S%H776><s%> and the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> me in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> court that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the north; <S%H6828><s%> where there was the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy, <S%H7068><s%> which provokes to jealousy. <S%H7069><s%>
Behold, <S%H3519><s%> the glory of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was there, <S%H4758><s%> according to the appearance that I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the plain. <S%H1237><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> now the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north. <S%H6828><s%> So I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north, <S%H6828><s%> and see, <S%H6828><s%> northward of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> this image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> in the entry. <S%H872><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%> what they do? <S%H6213><s%> even the great <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> do commit <S%H6213><s%> here, <S%H7368><s%> that I should go far off from my sanctuary? <S%H4720><s%> But you shall again <S%H7725><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> yet other great <S%H1419><s%> abominations. <S%H8441><s%>
He brought <S%H935><s%> me to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%> and when I looked, <S%H7200><s%> behold, <S%H259><s%> a hole <S%H2356><s%> in the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> dig <S%H2864><s%> now in the wall: <S%H7023><s%> and when I had dug <S%H2864><s%> in the wall, <S%H7023><s%> behold, <S%H259><s%> a door. <S%H6607><s%>
He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H935><s%> Go in, and see <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that they do here. <S%H6213><s%>

So I went in <S%H935><s%> and saw; <S%H7200><s%> and see, <S%H8403><s%> every form of creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and abominable <S%H8263><s%> animals, <S%H929><s%> and all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> portrayed <S%H2707><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the wall. <S%H7023><s%>

There stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and in their midst <S%H8432><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan, <S%H8227><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> with his censer <S%H4730><s%> in his hand; <S%H3027><s%> and the odor <S%H6282><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> went up. <S%H5927><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1121><s%> Son of man, <S%H120><s%> have you seen <S%H7200><s%> what the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> in the dark, <S%H2822><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his rooms <S%H2315><s%> of imagery? <S%H4906><s%> for they say, <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> doesn't <S%H7200><s%> see us; <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
He said <S%H559><s%> also to me, <S%H7725><s%> You shall again see <S%H7200><s%> yet other great <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they do. <S%H6213><s%>

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> which was toward the north; <S%H6828><s%> and see, <S%H3427><s%> there sat the women <S%H802><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> for Tammuz. <S%H8542><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> Have you seen this, <S%H1121><s%> son of man? <S%H120><s%> You shall again <S%H7725><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> yet greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations than these. <S%H8441><s%>

He brought <S%H935><s%> me into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house; <S%H1004><s%> and see, <S%H6607><s%> at the door of the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> between the porch <S%H197><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> were about twenty <S%H6242><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> with their backs <S%H268><s%> toward the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and their faces <S%H6440><s%> toward the east; <S%H6924><s%> and they were worshipping <S%H7812><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> toward the east. <S%H6924><s%>

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> Have you seen this, <S%H1121><s%> son of man? <S%H120><s%> Is it a light thing <S%H7043><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that they commit <S%H6213><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they commit <S%H6213><s%> here? <S%H4390><s%> for they have filled the land <S%H776><s%> with violence, <S%H2555><s%> and have turned <S%H7725><s%> again to provoke me to anger: <S%H3707><s%> and behold, <S%H7971><s%> they put the branch <S%H2156><s%> to their nose. <S%H639><s%>

Therefore will I also deal <S%H6213><s%> in wrath; <S%H2534><s%> my eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare, <S%H2347><s%> neither will I have pity; <S%H2550><s%> and though they cry <S%H7121><s%> in my ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> yet will I not hear them. <S%H8085><s%>
